lab-1-step-14-ig1.prompt: A screenshot showing text being pasted into the PCPP response tabs.

lab-1-step-16-ig1.prompt: A screenshot of the 'Sort' button being highlighted in the PCPP toolbar.

lab-1-step-17-ig1.prompt: A screenshot of the 'Select This Response' button being highlighted in the PCPP.

lab-1-step-18-ig1.alt: The Git repository not found error.

lab-1-step-19-ig1.prompt: An encouraging graphic showing a circular arrow with 'Find Problem -> Ask AI for Help -> Get Solution -> Repeat.'

lab-1-step-21-ig1.prompt: A screenshot of the 'Accept Selected' button being highlighted in the PCPP.

lab-1-step-22-ig1.prompt: A screenshot of the `GitHub-Repository-Setup-Guide.md` file open in the editor.

lab-1-step-23-ig1.prompt: A screenshot of the 'Generate prompt.md' button being highlighted in the PCPP.

lab-1-step-24-ig1.prompt: A screenshot of the new `prompt.md` file, showing the newly included artifacts.

lab-1-step-25-ig1.prompt: A screenshot of the '+' button in the cycle navigator being highlighted.

lab-1-step-29-ig1.prompt: A screenshot of the 'Baseline (Commit)' button being clicked in Cycle 1, now successfully.

lab-1-step-30-ig1.prompt: A stylized image of a GitHub logo with a quest marker over it.

lab-1-step-31-ig1.prompt: A screenshot of the 'Successfully initialized repository' notification in VS Code.

lab-1-step-32-ig1.prompt: A screenshot of the PCPP in a new cycle with the title 'Create Project Scaffold.'

lab-1-step-33-ig1.prompt: A graphic showing the core V2V loop: Generate, Copy, Send, Create, Paste, Parse, Select.

lab-1-step-34-ig1.prompt: A screenshot of the 'Baseline (Commit)' and 'Accept Selected' buttons being highlighted for the scaffold cycle.
lab-1-step-34-ig1.alt: Baselining and accepting the scaffold code.
